trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of its turns, Agnes can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If Agnes is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Agnes instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: Agnes deals an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Agnes that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and Agnes doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Master of Tactics
entries: Agnes can use the Help action as a bonus action. Additionally, when Agnes uses the Help action to aid an ally in attacking a creature, the target of that attack can be within 30 feet of you, rather than within 5 feet of Agnes, if the target can see or hear you.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk ml} {@hit 7} to hit, one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: Agnes halves the damage that it takes from an attack that hits it. Agnes must be able to see the attacker.
Agnes Stewart is a retired adventurer that occupies her time providing assistance in various investigations. Her areas of expertise are cults and secret organizations.
